name.en: Methodology for Chinese as Second Language

notice.ch: 華語文學分學程選修課程。

remark.ch: 華語文學分學程選修課程。

goal.ch:
本課程以概念為本；方法為主；理論為輔。上課內容著重思考、實作、創新、合作，及反思。
學生修完本課程之後應能：
1. 理解第二語言教學理論和方法並能與教學實務連結；
2. 掌握不同級別華語文教材特性及教學之重點；
3. 具備華語文教學活動設計和編寫教案之能力；
4. 善用並發展具針對性和實用性之教學策略。

outline.ch:
本課程主要教學對象為華語文教學學程學生，上課內容以教學方法為主；理論為輔；強調「做中學」、創新、實用，以及合作學習。
學期間學生除聽講、研讀專書和研討之外，需完成指定專題。本課程之教學重點簡列如下：
1. 語言教學法的歷史回顧
2. 溝通式教學法的原則
3. 學習者與學習動機
4. 語言能力分級與教材
5. 華語教材簡介與分析
6. 通用華語、學術華語、專業華語
7. 教學目標和教案撰寫
8. 教材及教學內容選取
9. 班級經營
10.語言技能與文化策略導向教學
11. 詞彙教學
12. 語法教學
13. 會話教學
14. 資訊與GAI融入備課與教學

outline.en:
The main teaching targets of this course are Chinese Language Teaching Program students. The content of the class is mainly based on teaching methods, supplemented by theory. It emphasizes “learning by doing“, innovation, practicality, and cooperative learning.
During the semester, in addition to listening to lectures, studying special books and conducting seminars, students are required to complete designated topics. The teaching highlights of this course are briefly summarized as follows:
1. Historical review of language teaching methods
2. Principles of communicative teaching method
3. Learners and learning motivation
4. Language proficiency grading and teaching materials
5. Introduction and analysis of Chinese teaching materials
6. General Chinese, Academic Chinese, Professional Chinese
7. Teaching objectives and lesson plan writing
8. Selection of teaching materials and teaching content
9. Class management
10. Language skills and cultural strategy-oriented teaching
11. Vocabulary teaching
12. Grammar teaching
13. Conversation teaching
14. Integrate information and GAI into lesson preparation and teaching

gradMethod.ch:
課程參與: 60％
出席狀況 (10％)
課堂討論、小組活動、導讀後線上討論和作業 (30％)
課堂報告、導讀 (20％)
期末專題(教案撰寫及活動設計) : 40％
# 課堂表現: 指聽講態度、發言、討論、團隊合作等表現。
# 學生須參與教學研討會或聽演講至少2次，並繳交聽講心得2篇。
gradMethod.en:
Course participation: 60％
Attendance status (10％)
Class discussions, group activities, post-reading online discussions and assignments (30％)
Class report, introduction (20％)
Final project (lesson plan writing and activity design): 40％
# Classroom performance: refers to performance such as listening attitude, speaking, discussion, teamwork, etc.
# Students must participate in teaching seminars or listen to lectures at least 2 times, and submit 2 essays on their listening experience.

flexDiscription.ch: 本學期此課程採用16+2週模式。學生課堂學習16週，學期中之後，教師將依學生學習情況和專題進行個別指導及諮詢2週以上。
flexDiscription.en: The students of this course will study in classroom for 16 weeks. After the middle of the semester, teachers will provide individual guidance and consultation based on students‘ learning conditions and topics.
